dmca.title: 75thrangers.us
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Mir [mailto:mbahmanyar@sbcglobal.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 01, 2006 11:28 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: 75thrangers.us


Hello:

I am the author of this history which is being used on the site without my
permission

http://75thrangers.us/portal/modules.php?name=InfoCenter
<http://75thrangers.us/portal/modules.php?name=InfoCenter&content=history>
&content=history

The only website authorized to use this history is
http://www.75thrra.com/index-units.htm follow the links on the left hand
side.

I have contacted the author via email and telephone for several years now
and asked him to at least credit the Ranger association listed above as I
wrote it specifically for them.

Registrant:    Make this info private
     Gorham, Scott
      
      135 Brook Road
       Sanbornton, NH 03269
       US
       
      Domain Name: 75THRANGERS.US
 
      Administrative Contact , Technical Contact :     
      Gorham, Scott
       smgorham@gmail.com
      135 Brook Road
       Sanbornton, NH 03269
       US
       Phone: 603-520-8383
       Fax: 603-524-9775
       
      Record expires on 28-May-2010    
      Record created on 28-Mar-2005
      Database last updated on 03-May-2005

      Domain servers in listed order:    Manage DNS

      NS1.THEPLANET.COM    216.234.234.30     
      NS2.THEPLANET.COM    12.96.160.115     
       
I am asking your company to notify him of his repeated copyright
infringement and to disable his website until he either credits me or the
75th Ranger Regiment Association or he removes it completely.

Best
Mir Bahmanyar
Los Angeles, CA
